Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;17/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;16.&lt;/strong&gt; The Supreme Character of Jada Bharata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;18/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;17.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;19/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;18.&lt;/strong&gt; The Discussion Between Jada Bharata and Maharaja Rahugana&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;20/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;19.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;21/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;20.&lt;/strong&gt; Jada Bharata Instructs King Rahugana&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;22/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;21.&lt;/strong&gt; The Conversation Between Maharaja Rahugana and Jada Bharata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;23/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;22.&lt;/strong&gt; Further Talks Between King Rahugana and Jada Bharata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;24/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;23.&lt;/strong&gt; The Material World as the Great Forest of Enjoyment&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;25/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;24.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;26/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;25.&lt;/strong&gt; The Glories of the Descendants of King Priyavrata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;27/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;26.&lt;/strong&gt; A Description of Jambudvipa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;28/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;27.&lt;/strong&gt; The Descent of the River Ganges&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;29/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;28.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;30/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;29.&lt;/strong&gt; The Prayers Offered to the Lord by the Residents of Jambudvipa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;31/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;30.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;32/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;31.&lt;/strong&gt; A Description of the Island of Jambudvipa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;33/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;32.&lt;/strong&gt; Studying the Structure of the Universe&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;34/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;33.&lt;/strong&gt; The Movements of the Sun&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;35/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;34.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;36/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;35.&lt;/strong&gt; The Orbits of the Planets&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;37/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;36.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;38/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;37.&lt;/strong&gt; The Sisumara Planetary Systems&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;39/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;38.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;40/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;39.&lt;/strong&gt; The Subterranean Heavenly Planets&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;41/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;40.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;42/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;41.&lt;/strong&gt; The Glories of Lord Ananta&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;43/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;42.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;44/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;43.&lt;/strong&gt;             &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;

                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-paint-brush&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;

            &amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme-popup&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Themes&amp;amp;quot; role=&amp;amp;quot;menu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;light&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Light&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;ayu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Ayu&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-search&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Fifth Canto - The Creative Impetus&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;i id=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print-button&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-print&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/variables.css&quot;&gt;

&lt;!-- Fonts --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:500&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;highlight.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;tomorrow-night.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;ayu-highlight.css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

The Descent of the River Ganges&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;29/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;28.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;30/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;29.&lt;/strong&gt; A Description of the Island of Jambudvipa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;33/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;32.&lt;/strong&gt; Studying the Structure of the Universe&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;34/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;33.&lt;/strong&gt; The Movements of the Sun&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;35/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;34.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;36/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;35.&lt;/strong&gt; The Orbits of the Planets&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;37/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;36.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;38/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;37.&lt;/strong&gt; The Sisumara Planetary Systems&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;39/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;38.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;40/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;39.&lt;/strong&gt; The Subterranean Heavenly Planets&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;41/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;40.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;42/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;41.&lt;/strong&gt; The Glories of Lord Ananta&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;43/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;42.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;44/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;43.&lt;/strong&gt; &amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar-sticky-container&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;quot;left-buttons&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-bars&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-haspopup=&amp;amp;quot;true&amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-paint-brush&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme-popup&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Themes&amp;amp;quot; role=&amp;amp;quot;menu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;light&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Light&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;ayu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Ayu&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-search&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Fifth Canto - The Creative Impetus&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/variables.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/general.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/chrome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/print.css&quot; media=&quot;print&quot;&gt;

&lt;!-- Fonts --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:500&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;highlight.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;tomorrow-night.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;ayu-highlight.css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

The Dynasty of Puru&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;40/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;40.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;41/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;41.&lt;/strong&gt; The Dynasty of Bharata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;42/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;42.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;43/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;43.&lt;/strong&gt; The Descendants of Ajamidha&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;44/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;44.&lt;/strong&gt; The Dynasties of the Sons of Yayati&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;45/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;45.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;46/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;46.&lt;/strong&gt; Krsna, the Supreme Personality of Godhea&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;/ol&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;div id=&quot;sidebar-resize-handle&quot; class=&quot;sidebar-resize-handle&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;

&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar-sticky-container&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;quot;left-buttons&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-bars&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-haspopup=&amp;amp;quot;true&amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-paint-brush&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme-popup&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Themes&amp;amp;quot; role=&amp;amp;quot;menu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;light&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Light&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;ayu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Ayu&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-search&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Ninth Canto - Liberation&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;i id=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print-button&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-print&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

Home - Eighth Canto - Withdrawal of the Cosmic Creations 
    <meta content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv="Content-Type">
    <meta name="description" content="">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <meta name="theme-color" content="#ffffff" />

&lt;link rel=&quot;shortcut icon&quot; href=&quot;favicon.png&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/variables.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/general.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/chrome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/print.css&quot; media=&quot;print&quot;&gt;

&lt;!-- Fonts --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:500&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;highlight.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;tomorrow-night.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;ayu-highlight.css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

        &amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;quot;left-buttons&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-bars&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-haspopup=&amp;amp;quot;true&amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-paint-brush&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme-popup&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Themes&amp;amp;quot; role=&amp;amp;quot;menu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;light&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Light&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;ayu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Ayu&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-search&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Eighth Canto - Withdrawal of the Cosmic Creations&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;i id=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print-button&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-print&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;

&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;

&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. &amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Seventh Canto - The Science of God&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

Home - Sixth Canto - Prescribed Duties for Mankind 
    <meta content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv="Content-Type">
    <meta name="description" content="">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <meta name="theme-color" content="#ffffff" />

&lt;link rel=&quot;shortcut icon&quot; href=&quot;favicon.png&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/variables.css&quot;&gt;

&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;

&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-haspopup=&amp;amp;quot;true&amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;light&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Light&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;ayu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Ayu&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Sixth Canto - Prescribed Duties for Mankind&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');

link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);

<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;nav id=&quot;sidebar&quot; class=&quot;sidebar&quot; aria-label=&quot;Table of contents&quot;&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;sidebar-scrollbox&quot;&gt;

Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;15/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;15.&lt;/strong&gt; A Description of the Character of Bharata Maharaja&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;16/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;16.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;19/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;19.&lt;/strong&gt; The Discussion Between Jada Bharata and Maharaja Rahugana&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;20/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;20.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;21/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;21.&lt;/strong&gt; Jada Bharata Instructs King Rahugana&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;22/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;22.&lt;/strong&gt; The Conversation Between Maharaja Rahugana and Jada Bharata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;23/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;23.&lt;/strong&gt; Further Talks Between King Rahugana and Jada Bharata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;24/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;24.&lt;/strong&gt; The Material World as the Great Forest of Enjoyment&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;25/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;25.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;26/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;26.&lt;/strong&gt; The Glories of the Descendants of King Priyavrata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;27/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;27.&lt;/strong&gt; A Description of Jambudvipa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;28/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;28.&lt;/strong&gt;         &amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;quot;left-buttons&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-bars&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-haspopup=&amp;amp;quot;true&amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-paint-brush&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme-popup&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Themes&amp;amp;quot; role=&amp;amp;quot;menu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;light&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Light&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;ayu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Ayu&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-search&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Fifth Canto - The Creative Impetus&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;nav id=&quot;sidebar&quot; class=&quot;sidebar&quot; aria-label=&quot;Table of contents&quot;&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;sidebar-scrollbox&quot;&gt;
&lt;ol class=&quot;chapter&quot;&gt;&lt;li class=&quot;affix&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;../../index.html&quot; class=&quot;active&quot;&gt;Home&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li class=&quot;affix&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;index.html&quot;&gt;Table of Contents&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;1/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;1.&lt;/strong&gt; Genealogical Table of the Daughters of Manu&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;2/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;2.&lt;/strong&gt; Daksa Curses Lord Siva&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;3/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;3.&lt;/strong&gt; Talks Between Lord Siva and Sati&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;4/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;4.&lt;/strong&gt; Sati Quits Her Body&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;5/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;5.&lt;/strong&gt; Frustration of the Sacrifice of Daksa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;6/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;6.&lt;/strong&gt; Brahma Satisfies Lord Siva&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;7/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;7.&lt;/strong&gt; The Sacrifice Performed by Daksa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;8/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;8.&lt;/strong&gt; Dhruva Maharaja Leaves Home for the Forest&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;9/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;9.&lt;/strong&gt; Dhruva Maharaja Returns Home&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;10/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;10.&lt;/strong&gt; Dhruva Maharaja’s Fight With the Yaksas&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;11/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;11.&lt;/strong&gt; Svayambhuva Manu Advises Dhruva Maharaja to Stop Fighting&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;12/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;12.&lt;/strong&gt; Dhruva Maharaja Goes Back to Godhead&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;13/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;13.&lt;/strong&gt; Description of the Descendants of Dhruva Maharaja&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;14/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;14.&lt;/strong&gt; The Story of King Vena&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;15/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;15.&lt;/strong&gt; King Prthu’s Appearance and Coronation&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;16/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;16.&lt;/strong&gt; Praise of King Prthu by the Professional Reciters&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;17/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;17.&lt;/strong&gt; Maharaja Prthu Becomes Angry at the Earth&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;18/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;18.&lt;/strong&gt; Prthu Maharaja Milks the Earth Planet&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;19/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;19.&lt;/strong&gt; King Prthu’s One Hundred Horse Sacrifices&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;20/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;20.&lt;/strong&gt; Lord Visnu’s Appearance in the Sacrificial Arena of Maharaja Prthu&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;21/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;21.&lt;/strong&gt; Instructions by Maharaja Prthu&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;22/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;22.&lt;/strong&gt; Prthu Maharaja’s Meeting with the Four Kumaras&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;23/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;23.&lt;/strong&gt; Maharaja Prthu’s Going Back Home&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;24/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;24.&lt;/strong&gt; Chanting the Song Sung by Lord Siva&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;25/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;25.&lt;/strong&gt; The Descriptions of the Characteristics of King Puranjana&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;26/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;26.&lt;/strong&gt; King Puranjana Goes to the Forest to Hunt, and His Queen Becomes Angry&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;27/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;27.&lt;/strong&gt; Attack by Candavega on the City of King Puranjana; the Character of Kalakanya&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;28/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;28.&lt;/strong&gt; Puranjana Becomes a Woman in the Next Life&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;29/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;29.&lt;/strong&gt; Talks Between Narada and King Pracinabarhi&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;30/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;30.&lt;/strong&gt; The Activities of the Pracetas&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;31/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;31.&lt;/strong&gt; Narada Instructs the Pracetas&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;/ol&gt;

                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Fourth Canto - The Creation of the Fourth Order&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

&lt;!-- Fonts --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:500&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;highlight.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;tomorrow-night.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;ayu-highlight.css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

Conversation Between Manu and Kardama&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;22/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;22.&lt;/strong&gt; The Marriage of Kardama Muni and Devahuti&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;23/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;23.&lt;/strong&gt; Devahuti’s Lamentation&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;24/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;24.&lt;/strong&gt; The Renunciation of Kardama Muni&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;25/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;25.&lt;/strong&gt; The Glories of Devotional Service&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;26/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;26.&lt;/strong&gt; Fundamental Principles of Material Nature&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;27/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;27.&lt;/strong&gt; Understanding Material Nature&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;28/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;28.&lt;/strong&gt; Lord Kapila’s Instructions on the Execution of Devotional Service&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;29/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;29.&lt;/strong&gt; Explanation of Devotional Service by Lord Kapila&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;30/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;30.&lt;/strong&gt; Description by Lord Kapila of Adverse Fruitive Activities&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;31/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;31.&lt;/strong&gt; Lord Kapila’s Instructions on the Movements of the Living Entities&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;32/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;32.&lt;/strong&gt; Entanglement in Fruitive Activities&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;33/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;33.&lt;/strong&gt;         &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;

&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;

</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Second Canto - The Cosmic Manifestation&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
